agents.title: Tailored AI Agent Services for Different Scenarios

contentSummaryAgent.title: Audio Content Summary Agent
contentSummaryAgent.description: Automatically recognizes timestamped audio content and generates structured summaries using advanced reasoning models, quickly extracting key points and essential information.

podcastAgent.title: AI Interview Podcast Agent
podcastAgent.description: Professional interview podcast production agent that generates host and guest dialogue interviews based on input content, with intelligent voice matching and human-like voice synthesis to help you create high-quality interview podcast shows effortlessly.

voiceAgent.title: AI Voice Agent
voiceAgent.description: Intelligent voice-over service that generates professional voice-overs comparable to humans from text input. Multiple voice options, rich emotions, perfectly suited for all types of content.

videoAgent.title: AI Video Agent
videoAgent.description: One-stop video production agent, fully automated from script to finished video. Combines AI-generated content, voice-overs, and footage to quickly produce professional short videos.

features.title: Professional Voice AI Agents, Complete Solutions from Understanding to Creation

audioRecognitionAgent.title: Audio Recognition Agent
audioRecognitionAgent.description: Enterprise-grade speech recognition service supporting Mandarin Chinese + English + 27 dialects mixed recognition, as well as nearly 100 global languages. Provides precise timestamp and speaker separation.

contentSummaryAgent.title: Audio Summary Agent
contentSummaryAgent.description: Professional audio summary AI agent based on advanced reasoning technology for deep audio content understanding. Automatically generates structured summaries, turning long audio into essential highlights.

voiceGenerationAgent.title: Voice Generation Agent
voiceGenerationAgent.description: High-quality AI voice synthesis service supporting multiple tones and emotional expressions. From text to natural fluent speech, providing professional-grade voice creation for ads, audiobooks, and educational content.

podcastAgent.title: AI Interview Podcast Agent
podcastAgent.description: One-stop interview podcast production service that generates host and guest dialogue interviews based on input content. Intelligently matches voice characteristics, supports diverse voice synthesis for professional interview podcast creation.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Voice AI Agent Services

howToStart.question: How do I get started with voice AI agent services?
howToStart.answer: It's very simple! After registering an account, choose the voice AI agent type you need (audio recognition, audio summary, voice generation, or AI podcast), upload audio files or input text requirements, and the agent will automatically process and generate professional-grade results for you. No technical background required, ready to use immediately.

voiceQuality.question: How is the quality of content generated by AI agents?
voiceQuality.answer: Our AI agents use the latest deep learning models and excel in their respective professional fields. Voice synthesis approaches human level, video production meets professional standards, and podcast content is logically clear. All agents have been extensively trained and optimized.

contentOwnership.question: Who owns the copyright of content generated through agents?
contentOwnership.answer: All content generated through ITSAI agents is completely owned by you. You can freely use, modify, distribute, and commercialize this content without paying additional fees or royalties.

dataPrivacy.question: Is my audio data secure when using voice AI agent services?
dataPrivacy.answer: We strictly comply with data protection regulations and use enterprise-grade encryption technology. Your audio files are only used for AI processing and are automatically deleted or encrypted for storage after processing according to your settings. We never use your audio data for other purposes or model training.

pointsExpiry.question: How long are points valid?
pointsExpiry.answer: Subscription bonus points expire when the subscription ends, while purchased points are valid permanently. This design ensures that paying users' rights are protected while encouraging continuous subscription to enjoy more services.

upgradeAnytime.question: Can I upgrade my agent service plan anytime?
upgradeAnytime.answer: Absolutely! You can upgrade to a higher version of agent services anytime. Upgrades take effect immediately, and unused calls will accumulate to the next billing cycle, ensuring your investment isn't wasted.

enterpriseFeatures.question: What special features does Enterprise agent service include?
enterpriseFeatures.answer: Enterprise version provides custom agent development, private deployment, enterprise-grade data security, 24/7 technical support, and dedicated customer success manager services. Completely tailored agent solutions according to your business needs.

timestamp.sampleContent1: Welcome to ITSAI Agent audio content summary service. Today we will demonstrate how to use AI technology for intelligent audio content analysis and summarization.
timestamp.sampleContent2: Our system uses advanced speech recognition technology that can accurately identify multiple languages and dialects, including Mandarin Chinese and various regional dialects.
timestamp.sampleContent3: Through deep learning model analysis, the system can understand the semantics of audio content and generate structured summary reports.

summary.title: Summary Result
summary.summarizingDescription: Estimated 1-2 minutes, AI is analyzing content deeply
summary.copySuccessDescription: Summary content has been copied to clipboard
summary.copyErrorDescription: Unable to copy to clipboard, please select and copy manually
summary.downloadSuccessDescription: Summary content has been saved as text file
summary.downloadErrorDescription: Unable to download file, please try again later
summary.sampleTitle:
# Audio Content Summary

## Main Content Overview
This audio discusses the application and development trends of artificial intelligence in content creation.

## Key Points
1. **[00:00-02:30]** Breakthroughs in AI technology for audio processing
2. **[02:30-05:15]** Significant improvement in speech recognition accuracy
3. **[05:15-08:00]** Optimization improvements in content summarization algorithms
4. **[08:00-10:45]** Future development directions and application scenarios

## Core Insights
- AI audio processing technology has reached commercial-grade level
- Timestamp recognition accuracy exceeds 95%
- Multi-language support capabilities continue to strengthen
- Structured summary quality continues to optimize

## Conclusion
This audio content comprehensively introduces the current status and future development direction of AI audio processing technology, providing valuable reference information for related practitioners.
